content: अभ्युद्यत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Raised, lifted up; as °आयुध, °शस्त्र, °कर &c. {@--2@} Prepared or ready, exerting oneself for (with <ab>inf.</ab>, <ab>dat.</ab>, <ab>loc.</ab> or in <ab>comp.</ab>); <ls>M. 3. 20</ls>, <ls>Ku. 3. 70</ls>; <ls>Bṛ. S. 12. 6</ls>; <ls>Me. 57</ls>; <ls>Ms. 9. 302.</ls> {@--3@} Gone forth, risen, appearing forth or approaching; कुलमभ्युद्यतनूतनेश्वरं <ls>R. 8. 15.</ls> {@--4@} Given or brought unsolicited.
